reviews.review: Great story, great acting, action and heart!
Great Humor, Some Surprises and Emotional.  If you have been watching the MCU - You will be invested!

I was worried about how Marvel would handle having all those characters packed into one film but they pulled it off. All I can say if you're like me and have been a fan for years, prepare to have your emotions toyed with,

Finally a movie that the Villians kick ass and get realized that there evil. This movie shows the Consequences of being a super hero and the risks you take as becoming an Avenger! Though Hulk was abit  dummed down cause i think hulks rage us much more fire and he wouldn't bavk down from a fight but I guess that was too show that Thanos was a strong unstobable Force. This mobie was full of surprises at every turn!!

Marvel goes DC! Bold moves. Death. Destruction. Chaos. Mayhem. Dark. Violent. I loved that aspect. Run-time was a little heavy. Thanos was handled well. CGI issues throughout and some wasted opportunities kept it from a perfect score. 3/10 Rewatchability Factor.
Critics finally delivered KARMA to Marvel Studios. Thank you!

Hands down Marvel Avengers: Infinity War is one of the BEST MOVIE, if not the best movie ever made. It more than a comic book movie. AIW shouldn't be this great with everything that it had to balance. They knocked it out the park. I've seen it twice already, and i plan on watching it probably 4 more times. this is a once in a lifetime cinematic experience that everyone would enjoy. Box Office projection i think it would cross 2 billion.
This movie was more than I could have ever imagined! I had very few issues with the movie overall, and enjoyed this movie from beginning to end! Well worth seeing it if you are a comic book fan!
This movie is a middle finger to all the criticisms Marvel films have faced in the past.
85%?  And you gave Black Panther 96%, the audience rating betrays your true feelings towards the movie.
Awesome!!! Action packed. I can't wait for the next Avengers sequel.
